title: Quotes to Scrape
text: Viewing tag: life “The fear of death follows from the fear of life. A man who lives fully is prepared to die at any time.” by Mark Twain (about) “I'm the one that's got to die when it's time for me to die, so let me live my life the way I want to.” by Jimi Hendrix (about) “But better to get hurt by the truth than comforted with a lie.” by Khaled Hosseini (about)
